line.originaltext: 3 pounds beef roast
2 onions, chopped
2 (12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles beer
line.annotation: create_ing(ing88, "2 (12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles beer")

line.originaltext: 6 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce
2 teaspoons liquid smoke flavoring
2 teaspoons garlic powder
2 teaspoons ground black pepper
salt to taste
1 (18 ounce) bottle barbecue sauce
2 cups water
Preheat oven to 275 degrees (135 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 275 degrees (135 degrees C).
line.annotation: set(t17,"preheat to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C)")

line.originaltext: Place roast in a large roasting pan and scatter chopped onions over.
Place roast in a large roasting pan and scatter chopped onions over.
Place roast in a large roasting pan and scatter chopped onions over.
line.annotation: combine({ing86, ing87}, ing96, "beef roast and onions", "scatter onions over")

line.originaltext: In a large bowl, combine Worcestershire sauce, liquid smoke, garlic powder, salt and pepper.
In a large bowl, combine Worcestershire sauce, liquid smoke, garlic powder, salt and pepper.
line.annotation: combine({ing89, ing90, ing91, ing92, ing93}, ing97, "worcestershire mix", "")

line.originaltext: In a large bowl, combine Worcestershire sauce, liquid smoke, garlic powder, salt and pepper.
Pour in beer, stir and add to roasting pan.
line.annotation: combine({ing88, ing97}, ing98, "beer and worcestershire mx", "pour in beer")

line.originaltext: Pour in beer, stir and add to roasting pan.
Pour in beer, stir and add to roasting pan.
Add water to the top of beef.
line.annotation: combine({ing100, ing95}, ing101, "wet beef with sauce", "add water to top of beef")

line.originaltext: Cover and cook in oven at 275 degrees F (135 degrees C) for 4 to 5 hours.
line.annotation: cook(ing101, t17, ing102, "cooked meat", "cover and cook at 275 degrees F (135 degrees C) for 4 to 5 hours")

line.originaltext: When meat is cooked, shred meat with 2 forks, add barbecue sauce and mix well.
When meat is cooked, shred meat with 2 forks, add barbecue sauce and mix well.
line.annotation: cut(ing102, t20, ing103, "shredded meat", "shred with two forks")

line.originaltext: When meat is cooked, shred meat with 2 forks, add barbecue sauce and mix well.
line.annotation: combine({ing103, ing94}, ing104, "meat and sauce", "mix well")
